thread.title: Emmy for Sheridan?
thread.title_full: Emmy for Sheridan? | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Emmy for Sheridan?
text:
Lincolnshire-born actress Sheridan Smith has been nominated for an International Emmy for her portrayal of the late Cilla Black.
Sheridan Smith Credit: Press Association Sheridan, who's from Epworth, played the lead in the ITV drama 'Cilla', winning a National Television award and TV Choice award, along with a BAFTA nomination for the performance. The awards take place at the end of November in New York.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Entertainment Lincolnshire
